name: Spoopcore 4
description:
Content warning: sex, depression, suicide, murder

Reggie has found his way back home only to find his life in just as big a mess as before. In the day he suffers from his trauma and at night he's visited by his former captors. The only way he can escape them for good is to experience true happiness, but that's easier said than done.

The Halloween 2021 installment of the Spoopcore series, made in only a week because I had to move this month. I hope you enjoy it regardless.

Spoopcore 1: https://cosheena.bandcamp.com/album/spoopcore

Spoopcore 2: https://cosheena.bandcamp.com/album/spoopcore-2-spooped-to-death

Spoopcore 3: https://msbasilisk.itch.io/spoopcore-3
